561350.name: SLG Remix - Definitive Soundtrack
561350.description:
2-in-1! Official soundtracks for the games Sacred Line and Sacred Line Genesis combined in the most complete and definitive package.

Composed and performed by Sasha Darko (except track 08, which is composed and performed by Vyp'). Includes previously unreleased "Sacred Line Genesis - Credits" theme and bonus psycho industrial track "Sacred Line Theme (Mindfuck Mix)" featuring Russian ethno / ambient female singer / composer Vyp'.

Tracklist:

01 - Main Menu Theme 00:33
02 - Ellen's Theme 01:33
03 - Underground Sequence 03:00
04 - Lift Sequence 00:37
05 - Encounter 02:10
06 - Eastern Europe Sequence 00:40
07 - Credits Theme 00:25
08 - Pustyn' 10:22 (by VYP')
09 - 80s (Secret Ending Track) 01:38
10 - Credits (Sacred Line Genesis) 0:39
11 - Sacred Line Theme (2013 Mindfuck Mix feat. Vyp) 2:15
